statements: SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT id, ar_metadata FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT id, ar_model FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE ar_texture IS NOT NULL AND ar_metadata ->> 'type' = 'avatar';
SELECT id, ar_metadata ->> 'name' AS model_name, created_at FROM augmented_reality_content ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, ar_texture, updated_at FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content;
SELECT id, ar_model, ar_texture FROM augmented_reality_content ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE ar_metadata @> '{"category": "furniture"}';
SELECT id, created_at, updated_at FROM augmented_reality_content ORDER BY updated_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE content_location = 'Paris';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM augmented_reality_assets WHERE asset_type = '3D Model';
SELECT content_name, content_type, content_description FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE content_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_assets WHERE content_id = '3674cfa7-04b3-4dbe-8cad-6a6e02d74a53';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE content_type='Animation';
SELECT content_name, content_location FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE content_id='1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4d8b';
SELECT content_name, asset_name FROM augmented_reality_content JOIN augmented_reality_assets ON augmented_reality_content.content_id = augmented_reality_assets.content_id;
SELECT content_name, content_location FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE content_name LIKE '%avatar%' ORDER BY content_name DESC;

SELECT content_name, asset_location FROM augmented_reality_content LEFT JOIN augmented_reality_assets ON augmented_reality_content.content_id = augmented_reality_assets.content_id WHERE asset_type='Image';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content
SELECT name, type FROM augmented_reality_content ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, type FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE type = 'AR Model'
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Image' ORDER BY asset_name
SELECT user_id, content_access FROM user_permissions
SELECT id, name, type FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE type='image' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_assets WHERE asset_type='model' AND asset_name='car';
SELECT id, asset_name FROM augmented_reality_assets WHERE id > 100;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content JOIN augmented_reality_assets ON augmented_reality_content.id = augmented_reality_assets.id;
SELECT user_id, content_access FROM user_permissions WHERE asset_access = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ar_content;
SELECT id, content_name, content_type FROM ar_content ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT id, content_name FROM ar_content WHERE id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ar_users;
SELECT * FROM ar_content ORDER BY created_at DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_name, content_type, content_url FROM ar_content WHERE content_type = 'article' AND content_name LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY content_name ASC;
SELECT ar_content.content_name, ar_assets.asset_name FROM ar_content JOIN ar_assets ON ar_content.id = ar_assets.id WHERE ar_content.created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT ar_users.username, ar_permissions.permission_level FROM ar_users JOIN ar_permissions ON ar_users.id = ar_permissions.user_id WHERE ar_permissions.permission_level >= 2 ORDER BY ar_users.username DESC;

SELECT ar_content.content_name, ar_users.username, ar_permissions.permission_level FROM ar_content JOIN ar_permissions ON ar_content.id = ar_permissions.content_id JOIN ar_users ON ar_permissions.user_id = ar_users.id WHERE ar_permissions.permission_level = 3 ORDER BY ar_content.content_name ASC, ar_users.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content;
SELECT content_name, content_type, content_url FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE content_type = 'Image';
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_description FROM augmented_reality_content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_url, asset_size FROM content_assets WHERE asset_size > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content;
SELECT content_name, content_type, content_url FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE content_type = '3D';

SELECT users.username, permissions.permission_type, content_assets.asset_type FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.role_id JOIN content_assets ON permissions.content_id = content_assets.content_id;

SELECT content_name, content_description, asset_size FROM augmented_reality_content JOIN content_assets ON augmented_reality_content.content_id = content_assets.content_id WHERE asset_type = 'image' ORDER BY asset_size DESC;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_type FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.role_id JOIN roles ON permissions.role_id = roles.role_id ORDER BY users.username ASC, roles.role_name DESC;
